emuInput.TitMainTitle: Sequoias club members, from left: Frances Parr, Yvonne Hall, Betty Hord (Jones), Alma Rector, Imogene Perrin, Virginia Jackson, and Maxine Wright posed with hands on knees in front of Pittsburgh Courier newspaper billboard with image of soldier on stretcher
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 27, 1945, pg. 15, reads: "Sequoias - These young ladies are tossing a hop at the Parish House, Centre Avenue, on November 2.  Left to right: Frances Parr, Yvonne Hall, Betty Hord, Alma Rector, Emogene [Imogene] Parrin [Perrin], Virginia Jackson and Maxine Wright. - Harris Photo."
